testCase.name: VerificationRequest Model should create a verification request with all properties
VerificationRequest Model should create a verification request without optional properties
POST /reviews Should return code 400 without movie_id
POST /reviews Should return code 400 without Authorization header
POST /reviews Should return code 401 Unauthorized
POST /reviews Should return code 500 database upload failed
POST /reviews Should return code 201
GET /reviews Should return code 400 without movie_id
GET /reviews Should return code 500 error fetching database
GET /reviews Should return code 200
DELETE /reviews Should return code 400 without any param
DELETE /reviews Should return code 400 without Authorization header
DELETE /reviews Should return code 401 Unauthorized
DELETE /reviews Should return code 500 database deletion failed
DELETE /reviews Should return code 200
GET /movies/search Should return code 400
GET /movies/search Should return code 500
GET /movies/search Should return code 200
GET /movies/search Should return MoviePoster[]
GET /movies Should return code 400
GET /movies Should return code 500
GET /movies Should return code 200
GET /movies Should return Movie
GET /movies/carousel Should return code 500
GET /movies/carousel Should return code 200
GET /movies/carousel Should return MoviePoster[]
GET /movies/home-list Should return code 500
GET /movies/home-list Should return code 200
GET /movies/home-list Should return MoviePoster[]
GET /actors/casting Should return code 400
GET /actors/casting Should return code 500
GET /actors/casting Should return code 200
GET /actors/casting Should return Actor[]
GET /actors Should return code 400
GET /actors Should return code 500
GET /actors Should return code 200
GET /actors Should return ActorProfile
GET /actors/movies Should return code 400
GET /actors/movies Should return code 500
GET /actors/movies Should return code 200
GET /actors/movies Should return Movies[]
UserFirebaseAuth Model should create a user with correct properties
isValidEmail Function should return true for a valid email
isValidEmail Function should return false for an email without @ symbol
isValidEmail Function should return false for an email without domain
isValidEmail Function should return false for an email without top-level domain
isValidEmail Function should return false for an email with spaces
isValidEmail Function should return false for an empty string
Review Model should create a review with correct properties
AllReviews Model should create an all reviews object with correct properties
CarouselMovie Model should create a carousel movie with correct properties
Genre Model should create a genre with correct properties
Movie Model should create a movie with correct properties
MoviePoster Model should create a movie poster with correct properties
Actor Model should create an actor with correct properties
ActorProfile Model should create an actor profile with correct properties
genderToString Function should return correct string for gender 0
genderToString Function should return correct string for gender 1
genderToString Function should return correct string for gender 2
genderToString Function should return correct string for gender 3
genderToString Function should return empty string for unknown gender
